name: RATLAB (Lazy Lynx, LilyLau, cielrosen)
description:
All the asset, characters, animation, and music is made by the team of this game during the jam period. The game was made using Unity.

After 7 years of being a hostage, Tobi finally decided to escape from the lab and go to the outside world to seek for help...

Can Tobi escape? Or will he be trapped forever in the lab, and be a lab human for what is left of his life?

Tell us what do you think?
